builders.name: generic-alpine318-docker-x64
boot_command: chroot /mnt apk add openntpd && chroot /mnt rc-update add openntpd default && reboot<enter>

inline: [ `docker images quay.io/generic/$BOX -q | wc -l` != 0 ] && docker rmi --force `docker images --quiet quay.io/generic/$BOX`
[ `docker images quay.io/roboxes/$BOX -q | wc -l` != 0 ] && docker rmi --force `docker images --quiet quay.io/roboxes/$BOX`
[ `docker images docker.io/roboxes/$BOX -q | wc -l` != 0 ] && docker rmi --force `docker images --quiet docker.io/roboxes/$BOX`
